name: Omniinfer
description:
## Omniinfer API: Fast Image Generation for 10,000+ Models  - Get Started For Free!

💡 **Features:** Text-to-Image / Image-to-Image / ControlNet / LoRA / Inpainting, supporting over 10,000+ models (including Stable Diffusion 1.x/2.x, SDXL 1.0, following civitai models, sfw / nsfw, 18+ / no 18+, hentai / no hentai, dreamlike, 3D, realistic, anime, realism, comic, fantasy, quality porn, art ).

🚀 To obtain a higher call limit and unlock additional features, please visit the site: [https://omnii...

api_methods.name: Text to Image
api_methods.description:
For asynchronous image generation, only a task_id will be returned. You should use the task_id to make a call to the /v2/progress API endpoint in order to retrieve the image generation results.

The output is provided in the format of "image/png".

The request cost is influenced by the following parameters: width, height.

utterances.utterance: Generate an image of a serene mountain landscape.
Create a fantasy scene with dragons and castles.
Produce a realistic portrait of a woman in a garden.
Make an anime-style image of a futuristic city.
Design a comic-style superhero flying over a metropolis.
Generate a 3D render of a spaceship exploring a new planet.
Create a dreamlike image of a forest with glowing trees.
Produce an art piece depicting a surreal underwater world.
Make a high-quality image of a knight battling a dragon.
Generate a realistic image of a bustling marketplace in a medieval town.

api_methods.name: Progress
api_methods.description:
This page will help you get started with text to image. Support ControlNet. 
Note if you get "status":0 in the response, please try this endpoint later untill the status become to 2

utterances.utterance: Can you check the progress of my image generation task with ID 12345?
What's the status of the task with ID abcde?
Is my image generation task with ID 67890 completed yet?
Could you tell me the progress of task ID xyz123?
Has the task with ID 98765 finished generating the image?
What is the current status of task ID qwerty?
Can you update me on the progress of task ID asdfgh?
Is there any progress on the task with ID zxcvbn?
How far along is the image generation task with ID 112233?
Could you check if task ID 445566 is done?

api_methods.name: Image to  Image
api_methods.description: This page will help you get started with text to image. Support ControlNet.

utterances.utterance: Can you generate an image based on this photo?
I need an image created from this picture.
Transform this image into a new one.
Generate a new image using this photo as a reference.
Can you create an image from this reference photo?
I want to turn this picture into a new image.
Use this image to generate a new one.
Can you make an image based on this reference?
Create a new image from this photo.
Generate an image using this picture as a base.

api_methods.name: Get Models
api_methods.description: This page will help you get started with text to image. Support ControlNet.

utterances.utterance: What models are available for text-to-image generation?
Can you show me the models suitable for anime style?
I need models for realistic image generation.
What options do I have for fantasy art models?
Show me the models that support ControlNet.
Are there any models specifically for 3D art?
What models are available for comic style illustrations?
Can you list the models that are suitable for dreamlike art?
I’m looking for models that can generate quality porn art.
What models are available for hentai style?

api_methods.name: Text to Image
api_methods.description:
For asynchronous image generation, only a task_id will be returned. You should use the task_id to make a call to the /v2/progress API endpoint in order to retrieve the image generation results.

The output is provided in the format of "image/png".

The request cost is influenced by the following parameters: width, height.
